:::config { "language": "alpinejs", "theme":"material-theme-palenight" }
<div x-data="{ }" x-on:click="console.log('testing')"></div>

<p x-html="{
    prop: "Testing",
    init() {
        this.isPrettyNeatRight();
    },

    test() {
        console.log('testing');
    },

}"</p>
:::expectation
